QuestData.Title: A Sentimental Relic
QuestData.Description: My father's bangle sat here for ages before that imposter Ikiss stole it away.$B$BI thank you for returning it, but I have no need for keepsakes. Take it, with my blessing.$B$BIf there are still Talonpriests loyal to the true Talon King, please bring it to them.
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring Lithic's Gift to Reshad in Veil Terokk.
QuestData.CompletionText: Hm? What's that you have there?
QuestData.RewardText: Lithic actually spoke to you? Or, some shade of her at least... $B$BFascinating!
